dict.acceptation: 拖车；追踪者；<美>拖车式活动房屋；（电影或电视节目的）预告片；

sent.orig: Description: Jaeger Poway Automotive Systems (Shenzhen)Ltd ---- Trailer connectors set for trailer lighting system.
sent.trans: 拖车连接器、拖车照明系统、连接线束总成。

sent.orig: Crown variegated green, white and pink, plain, ovate. Semiminiature trailer.
sent.trans: 绿色，白色，粉红色组合成的皇冠状斑叶，叶面平坦。半迷你悬垂型。

sent.orig: Tubes are generally mounted on truck-trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sent.trans: 管道一般是安装在拖车底座上，称作管道拖车。

sent.orig: This is the trailer of a film made Film Production club of Taipei Adventist Preparatory Academy.
sent.trans: 这是我们台北复临美国学校电影制作社团所制作的短片的预告片！

sent.orig: We have trailer mounted concrete pump, with productivity more than 60 cube m per hour.
sent.trans: 我们已展开拖车混凝土输送泵，与生产率超过60立方米每小时。
